content: for each visible slipped end stitch note pick up an extra stitch in the ladder between the stitches on the row below to avoid a gap place marker knit across instep stitches place marker and move to gusset side 2 pick extra stitch in the ladder between the stitches on the row below to avoid gap repeat instructions for side two of your gusset pick up one stitch for each visible slipped end stitch knit 11sts to middle of heel place marker to indicate new bor *make sure you end up with the same number of stiches on gusset sides 1 and 2 * please note the beginning of your round is now located at the center of the heel re-distribute stitches across the needles as necessary gusset decreases row 1 knit to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 sm knit across instep sts sm k1 ssk knit to end of round row 2 knit all stitches continue repeating rounds 1 and 2 until 64 72 total stitches remain the beginning of your round will now move back to the original position after completing last row 2 remove bor stitch marker knit to next marker this is now your bor you can remove marker 2 or leave it if you like it will be useful for the toe foot knit in pattern until you reach desired length approx 2 shorter than the total desired length ending on row 2 proceed to toe decreases toe if you removed marker 2 after the heel instructions place marker after knitting 32 36 stitches on the last round of the foot then proceed to toe decrease instructions below row 1 k1 *ssk knit to 3 sts before marker 2 k2tog k1 sm* repeat once more row 2 knit all stitches repeat these two row 8 10 times 32 total sts remain 16 per side graft remaining 16 sts together to close the toe weave in ends and block if desired much love & happy knitting thank you very much for knitting a pair of impossible girl socks i hope you enjoyed the pattern if you have any questions or feedback about the pattern please feel free to contact me at any of the following email thelittlemountyarnco@gmail com instagram @littlemountknits ravelry littlemountknits i d love it if you d tag me any project photos you post on instagram thanks again much love & happy knitting madeline for personal use only impossible girl socks ©madelinegannondesigns2015 | new design ©littlemountknits2020 clara oswald impossible girl and doctor who are all registered trademarks of the bbc
